title: Speech–language pathology
summary: Speech–language pathology (or speech and language pathology) is a field of expertise practiced by a clinician known as a speech–language pathologist (SLP)[1] or a speech and language therapist, both of whom may be known by the shortened description, speech therapist. Speech–language pathology is considered a "related health profession" or "allied health profession", along with audiology, optometry, occupational therapy, rehabilitation psychology, physical therapy, behavior analysis and others.
